message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can always negotiate further.
Your offer was a bit unfair, Alice. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  It's still a good deal for you before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Okay, let's compromise. I'll take 55% and you get 45%. This is a fair split considering the inflation, and we can avoid going through more rounds.
